metadata.name: Redis Cache Linked Servers
metadata.description: This module connects a primary and secondary Redis Cache together for geo-replication.
Required. The name of the secondary Redis cache. If not provided, the primary Redis cache name is used.
Required. The resource ID of the linked server. If not provided, the resource ID of the primary Redis cache is used.
Required. The location of the linked server. If not provided, the location of the primary Redis cache is used.
Optional. The role of the linked server. Possible values include: "Primary", "Secondary". Default value is "Secondary".
The hostname of the linked server.

geoReplicatedPrimaryHostName.value: [reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis/linkedServers', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('primaryRedisCacheName'), parameters('secondaryRedisCacheName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('primaryRedisCacheName'), parameters('secondaryRedisCacheName')), '/')[1]), '2024-03-01').geoReplicatedPrimaryHostName]
